This scholarship is open to all Indian nationals

  • The Deadline: The deadline varies

The outline of “Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi –The Financial Assistance for SC students is for following Higher studies in Foreign Universities,” was introduced with a view to empower the benefit of advanced education in foreign universities towards creditable SC students consequently providing them an opportunity for better career forecasts within the country and abroad.

Eligibility criteria for the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC:

  • Only Indian nationals are eligible.
  • Candidates whose parental income is a smaller amount than Rs.6.00 lakhs are eligible.
  • Note that only one child of the family shall be eligible under this scheme.
  • All applicants will benefit from at least 33% of the awards reserved for all female applicants.
  • Applicants who got the minimum percentage of marks to meet the examination requirements will be selected as each order of
  • candidates can further pursue MBBS, PG Diploma Courses (1 year / 1/2 years) Certified

Public Accountant (CPA) Certified Portfolio Manager (CPM).

The Value of the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC:

Successful candidates of the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC will be approved Rs.10.00 (5.00 +5.00) lakhs grant in two segments – the First segment of Rs.5.00 lakhs on the creation of landing permit/I-94 i.e., immigration card and the second segments on the creation of 1st-semester results.

The below are the Benefits of the Ambedkar Overseas Vidya Nidhi Scholarships for SC:

Students are able to avail of an enlightening loan of Rs.5.00 lakhs from any Nationalized Bank with the management of A.P. State Co-Operative Finance Corporation at predominant rates of interest.

Below is the step for online registration:

  1. Click on the tab “Online Application Form for Foreign Students”. You will be directed to the application form (page).
  2. Connect on “Fresh User Signup”.
  3. Go to your effective Email ID.
  4. Re-enter your valid Email ID.
  5. Enter your furtive code word.
  6. Re-enter your secret password.
  7. Enter your 10-digit portable number.   Please If you do not have any, input any 10 digits in the portable number cell.
  8. Enter the Captcha
  9. Click on Register.
  10. You will receive an email from admissions@aud.ac.in to prove your email address.
